subject: Fwd: Thank you, we are ready to give a loan
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
 
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TODAY):
 
$277,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this simple form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://ouarxqrpon.com/
